content.question: In Androgyne III, Magdalena Abakanowicz used a headless, shell-like, hollow figure to communicate which of the following to viewers?

choices.label: The artistâ€™s suffering from bodily injuries
The brutality of war and political trauma
The pain associated with the loss of a child
The depersonalization created by addiction to technology

content.answer: The brutality of war and political trauma

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
